EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.DC Follow Up Email - No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop - DC
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We’re sorry you were unable to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in Tysons Corner, November 5, 2014.
Visit run.pivotal.io <run.pivotal.io> to try Pivotal Web Services - simply upload your files and your app just works! Additionally, we’ve made the workshop presentations available here <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/tagged/pivotal%20cloud%20platform%20roadshow> so you can catch up on what you missed.
Interested in learning more about what Pivotal CF can do for your organization? Contact us <mailto:info@pivotal.io> to schedule a technical evaluation with our team.
We are looking forward to seeing you at a future event!
The Pivotal Team
